metadata.name: New ActiveScriptEventConsumer Created Via Wmic.EXE
metadata.comment: Detects WMIC executions in which an event consumer gets created. This could be used to establish persistence

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('activescripteventconsumer')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' create ')))

output.summary: Detects WMIC executions in which an event consumer gets created. This could be used to establish persistence

metadata.objective: Examine fields: process.cmd_line, process.parent_process.cmd_line False positive: Legitimate software creating script event consumers References: https://twitter.com/johnlatwc/status/1408062131321270282?s=12, https://www.fireeye.com/content/dam/fireeye-www/global/en/current-threats/pdfs/wp-windows-management-instrumentation.pdf
